0: Most of the staff has been with the organization for many years knows the area and its currents well and is extremely safety conscious
Staff walk the shore taking orders for lunch or drinks so beach picnics are easy
But the staff was always willing to accommodate any request
The personnel are rigorously trying to make your stay memorable
The housekeeping staff was amazing and kept our room spotless
Rooms are well done and staff is helpful
There are plenty of ferry services to get you from island to island
This is our 4th trip to Little Dix Bay over the years and as always the setting and the staff do not disappoint
We had a beach dinner for our anniversary the setting was quite special the service good
1: The service in the restaurant was very poor
We had a TV in the living room that could stream from our own devices no live TV service but we did not need it
Even Made to pay for ferry service to hotel so we opted on alternative travel

The overall facilities the location beach and main grounds remain stunning as always but the level of service delivered food quality and the execution of the refurbished rooms was so poor that it made for a very unpleasant vacation
Mostly our poor experience stemmed from an inadequate level of training of the staff so that most of the services were slow and poor
Service in restaurants was slow and generally not good at most meals we had to get up and walk or wave to get someone to take an order
It was disappointing there were no exercise classes at the gym but the staff was always helpful if any questions on the equipment
Part of the problem is that the hotel opened up only two months before we arrived after a multi year renovation and much of the staff was still learning their roles
4 Concierge a nice service but WAY overdone
